#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: simpleType UnitOfTemperature.

== Name ==

*[SUnitOfTemperature UnitOfTemperature]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
string
  |
  +--UnitOfTemperature (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Units of temperature for SI or imperial system.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	('C' | 'F')

----
    <xs:simpleType name="UnitOfTemperature">  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">    <xs:enumeration value="C"/>    <xs:enumeration value="F"/>  </xs:restriction></xs:simpleType>
----
